import { useState } from "react"; export default function RegistrationForm() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(""); const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); let users = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("users")); users.push({ email, password, companyName, fullName }); localStorage.setItem("users", JSON.stringify(users)); console.log("Form submitted"); }; const handleReset = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log("Form reset"); }; return (
